title: Limits the degree of physical force a parent, guardian, or other person entrusted with the care of a child or incompetent, may use to discipline such person
summary: Limits the degree of physical force a parent, guardian, or other person entrusted with the care of a child or incompetent, may use to discipline or otherwise protect the welfare of such person.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to use of physical force by a parent, guardian, teacher or other caregiver
